sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons living or dead is entirely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 与真实事件,地点,人物生死的任何雷同均纯属巧合.

sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual persons, places or events is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如与真人、真实地点或真实事件有雷同之处，纯属巧合。

sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual persons, places, or events is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如与实际的人、地、事有所雷同，纯属巧合。

sentences.en: Any resemblance to existing persons, places or events is entirely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如有与现实人物 、 地点及事件之雷同,实乃巧合.请勿考据.

sentences.en: Different episodes from different dramas are more than just coincidental -- they are directly connected.
sentences.cn: 宛如不同剧目的不同章节,生活并非都是巧合 —— 它们有着直接联系.

sentences.en: I suppose your presence here today is not entirely coincidental .
sentences.cn: 我认为你今天来这里不完全是碰巧。

sentences.en: I think that it is not coincidental that we now have arguably the best bookshops in the world.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们现在拥有了可以说是世界上最好的书店，这并非巧合。

sentences.en: My guess is that the majority of'predictive'dreams are purely coincidental Delaney.
sentences.cn: 我猜测大部分可预测到的梦纯粹是巧合.

sentences.en: Results The coincidental rate was 97.75 % . accurate ultrasonic diagnosis provided reliable data for operation.
sentences.cn: 结果:超声诊断与腹腔镜胆囊切除与病理符合率97.

sentences.en: The concurrence of their disappearances had to be more than coincidental.
sentences.cn: 他们同时失踪肯定不仅仅是巧合。

sentences.en: The similarity between these two essay is too great to be coincidental.
sentences.cn: 这两篇文章雷同的地方很多,并非巧合所致.

sentences.en: The theory is an effort to generalize about relationships that occur regularly, not about coincidental happenings.
sentences.cn: 该理论致力于概括某些规律性地发生的关系, 而不是论述那些偶然发生的关系.

sentences.en: These parallels cannot be merely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 这些相似之处不可能只是巧合.

sentences.en: This story is purely fictional. Any similarity is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 总的来说,是个哲理故事.

sentences.en: Unitary elasticity is the coincidental case that is just on the borderline between elastic and inelastic.
sentences.cn: 关于单弹性是一种巧合.这种巧合是有弹性和缺乏弹性的分界线.

words.tran_cn: 一致的；符合的；同时发生的
巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

trans.tran_en: happening completely by chance without being planned
